title: A Message of Hope - the Presence of Maitreya (Benjamin Creme)
description:
Information has for over 100 years been flowing in the world, about the existence 

of a group of enlightened, highly evolved men, men like us who have gone ahead of 

us in evolution and became perfect. They are said to be living in the remote 

mountain and desert areas of the world and were seen only by few people.


The first who spoke of Masters of Whisdom, as they are called, was a Russian Madam 

Helena Petrovna Blavatsky, founder of Theosophical Society. She claimed to have 

met them while on travelling across India and Tibet.


Later, from 1920 on, an English disciple Alice Ann Bailey published 19 esoteric 

books which she received telepathically from one of the masters named Djwhal Khul 

or simply The Tibetan.


Today the news about them and is being presented to the world by English artist 

and esotericist Benjamin Creme. 


His message is that despite of all the agonies the world today faces, a new torch 

of hope has been lit. The masters have decided to return openly in the world to 

help us in our crisis and to show us how deep our potential as humans goes - into 

infinity. Infront of the group comes their leader Maitreya, the one who has been 

expected for generations by all religions only that they call him by different 

names. 


They now come, at the dawn of the new age of Aquarius to help us realize and 

fulfil our destiny, a destiny of living gods.
